title: Pen.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Pen_default_talking>>
Hello, I don't think we've met
I'm Pen. 
I'm glad to finally meet you
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Pen_default_silent>>
Likewise
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Pen_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Pen.AddToEscapeQuest]]
[[Not really...|Pen.EndDialog]]

title: Pen.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Pen>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes
